messages.subject: Re: world of warcraft unschooling guild ( sorry if repost)
messages.msgSnippet: So sorry...one other thing: We noticed that the server/realm for the Unschooling Guild is an RP realm. After reading the guidelines on the WoW site we so
messages.messageBody:
So sorry...one other thing:
We noticed that the server/realm for the Unschooling Guild is an RP
realm. After reading the "guidelines" on the WoW site we so confused
as to how to even act on an RP server. Keeping in mind that we have
never even thought of playing an rp game before this. So do we have to
back story and entire character work ups? Thank you again for your
knowledge and help :)

Randi and Cole










--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "patrick morris"
<katinandrea@...> wrote:
>
>
> it has come
> an official unschooling guild has come into existence
> the name is HORDE OF UNSCHOOLERS
> the server is
> THE VENTURE CO
> it is a horde guild
>
> I know it is hard to begin a new character but think of the fun,
> there will be guild activities ( you can see some of the goofy ideas
> at the worlrdofwarcraft.com site for guild activities.
> this is a once in my lifetime oppurtunity.
> I know it is hard to switch servers there were 17 different servers
> of people who replied we chose one that no one had ( other than a
> high level horde who said they would help but couldn't leave their
> guild
> enjoy the pain
> we don't have the guild web site up yet but have a charter and are
> now beginning
> we hope to get team speak so we can talk in the game but I haven't
> figured out the way to arrange it ( anyone know?)
> we can use skype in the game
> if you down load skype.com you can call and talk to anyone online
> who has skype , even as the game is running ; I know you can have
> multiple people online but not sure if it will work for whole guild.
> we are in orgimar look for Ierezak, chronica and zzina ( we will
> change to blood elves in the expansion, though.
> please show solidarity
> patrick andrea and adli
>

messages.subject: Re: world of warcraft unschooling guild ( sorry if repost)
messages.msgSnippet: Patrick, My brother Cole and I have decided that we would like to be a part of the unschooling guild. We just started playing a couple of days ago and this is
messages.messageBody:
Patrick,
My brother Cole and I have decided that we would like to be a part of
the unschooling guild. We just started playing a couple of days ago
and this is really our first online gaming or mmorpg experience. Can
us virgin online gamers join your guild as well? We are hoping that if
we do we can learn really fast with this WoW World is all about.
Thank you so much,
Randi adult sister to Cole (12)

messages.subject: Re: world of warcraft unschooling guild ( sorry if repost)
messages.msgSnippet: ... time! That was old info I had (going on memory, she was sleeping when I posted earlier).   Her guild now uses ventrillo.com.   She says team speak and
messages.messageBody:
"jlh44music" <jlh44music@...> wrote:
> Danielle (14) uses skype (better than team speak she says) ALL the
time!>>

That was old info I had (going on memory, she was sleeping when I
posted earlier). Her guild now uses ventrillo.com. She says team
speak and skype aren't as good (less clear). With ventrillo (they
call it "vent") you have to create a server and make adjustments (she
didn't set it up so that's about all she knows). Also, something
about "speaks" is desirable (in the setup/adjustments part), it makes
it more clear when talking to each other.

Hope that helps!
Jann

messages.subject: Re: world of warcraft unschooling guild ( sorry if repost)
messages.msgSnippet: ... there will be guild activities ( you can see some of the goofy ideas at the worlrdofwarcraft.com site for guild activities. this is a once in my lifetime
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "patrick morris"
<katinandrea@...> wrote:
>it has come
>an official unschooling guild has come into existence
>the name is HORDE OF UNSCHOOLERS
>the server is THE VENTURE CO
> it is a horde guild
>
> I know it is hard to begin a new character but think of the fun,
there will be guild activities ( you can see some of the goofy ideas>
at the worlrdofwarcraft.com site for guild activities. this is a once
in my lifetime oppurtunity. I know it is hard to switch servers
there were 17 different servers of people who replied we chose one
that no one had ( other than a high level horde who said they would
help but couldn't leave their guild
> enjoy the pain we don't have the guild web site up yet but have a
charter and are now beginning
> we hope to get team speak so we can talk in the game but I haven't
figured out the way to arrange it ( anyone know?)
> we can use skype in the game
>if you down load skype.com you can call and talk to anyone online
who has skype , even as the game is running ; I know you can have
multiple people online but not sure if it will work for whole guild.
we are in orgimar look for Ierezak, chronica and zzina ( we will
change to blood elves in the expansion, though.
> please show solidarity
> patrick andrea and adli

Danielle (14) uses skype (better than team speak she says) ALL the
time! She says she can't imagine how she played before when she had
to just type and read, but she's got 2 level 60 characters so she's
involved in a lot of raids with a group.

She said she's interested in joining and doesn't mind creating new
characters, in fact she has several, alliance and horde, at many
different levels! I'll forward this info to her!
Jann

messages.subject: world of warcraft unschooling guild ( sorry if repost)
messages.msgSnippet: it has come an official unschooling guild has come into existence the name is HORDE OF UNSCHOOLERS the server is THE VENTURE CO it is a horde guild I know it
messages.messageBody:
it has come
an official unschooling guild has come into existence
the name is HORDE OF UNSCHOOLERS
the server is
THE VENTURE CO
it is a horde guild

I know it is hard to begin a new character but think of the fun,
there will be guild activities ( you can see some of the goofy ideas
at the worlrdofwarcraft.com site for guild activities.
this is a once in my lifetime oppurtunity.
I know it is hard to switch servers there were 17 different servers
of people who replied we chose one that no one had ( other than a
high level horde who said they would help but couldn't leave their
guild
enjoy the pain
we don't have the guild web site up yet but have a charter and are
now beginning
we hope to get team speak so we can talk in the game but I haven't
figured out the way to arrange it ( anyone know?)
we can use skype in the game
if you down load skype.com you can call and talk to anyone online
who has skype , even as the game is running ; I know you can have
multiple people online but not sure if it will work for whole guild.
we are in orgimar look for Ierezak, chronica and zzina ( we will
change to blood elves in the expansion, though.
please show solidarity
patrick andrea and adli
